preqs: ATS2224 or equivalent as determined by the coordinator

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2224}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS2226, ATS3226, ATS3247}

description: The unit develops Italian cultural knowledge and language proficiency through a focus on Italian historical and contemporary society. Passages from seminal Italian literary texts as well as other media are used to understand and critically analyse Italian society and its transformation in the last century.
